forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain after 10pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. South southeast wind 12 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle clarity envelops the city, though the mists are not far behind. Today promises a tapestry of weather—partly sunny skies invite a fleeting warmth, with temperatures expected to hover close to 58 degrees, easing a bit to 55 as the afternoon settles in. A light breeze from the south creates a delicate movement among the clouds, hinting at the intrusion of rain later in the day, as the skies give way to a more somber palette by nightfall.

The forecasted rain, arriving softly after 10 PM, looms with a 80% chance of stirring the air into a refreshing cool, paving the way for a cozy evening indoors. With clouds gathering and the winds quickening, it might be best to don a light jacket or wrap, embracing the chill while it lasts. As the day beckons, consider a stroll through one of the local parks or a visit to a quiet café, where you can sip warmth and watch the world breathe in the cool anticipation of the forthcoming rain.
